status.update: areas not mapped when screened at smaller scales during low level radioactive waste siting analysis

srctime.srccurr: telephone call to Dennis Lewis, GIS manager, Law Environmental, Inc. 717-561-1633

srcinfo.srccontr: Law Environmental contracted by the state to conduct a low level nuclear waste siting project. Analysis performed in ARCINFO. Information for the database gathered from several sources including the U.S. Geological Survey and tax parcel maps
